cause.description:
In order to create awareness around this materialistic town...and many others...we need people to recognize that BIODIESEL is a necessity for gas-stations. If people put together a plan and money, DISCOVERY CHANNEL and many others could sponser us and give us money, then host a show!
1. BIODIESEL is necessity!!!
2. Let global warming is recognized!
3. Save our EARTH
4. SAVE OUR GENERATION
cause.name: BIO-DIESEL
